predicate.note: Frames file for 'round' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 45.4, but I'm ignoring that because that doesn't match usage.

roleset.name: bring to completion, fulfill

example.name: blah blah blah
example.text: Mr. Brawer's wife, Catherine, and Robert Stroup, Elizabeth's husband, round out the five-member board.
example.arg: Mr. Brawer's wife, Catherine, and Robert Stroup, Elizabeth's husband,

roleset.note: This could also take a causative agent (John rounded out his group with a group of stooges) but that complicates things enormously, and doesn't occur anyway.

example.name: like a cattle drive
example.text: After the vote, Connecticut Rep. Nancy Johnson rounded up nearly as many signatures on a letter to Mr. Bush urging him not to veto.
example.arg: on a letter to Mr. Bush urging him not to veto
